name: Music Screen - To test Carousel Api.

testSteps.description:
Then Check whether the get request status code Response Code is correct having Data
| EndPoint | FileName | Content Type | Data | Response Code | UserID | Platform |
| /v1/home/banners/3 | HomeModuleFlowGetRequest.txt | json | 0 | 200 | ABC | com.mxplay.iOSPlayer |

restQuery.requestHeaders:
Authorization=
				Platform=com.mxplay.iOSPlayer
				UserID=ABC
				Data=0
				Response Code=200
				Accept=*/*
				Content-Type=application/json; charset=UTF-8
restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: nginx
Date: Fri, 10 Aug 2018 19:01:31 GMT
Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Vary: Accept-Encoding
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: POST, GET, OPTIONS, PUT, DELETE
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
X-Application-Context: application:prod:8080
Cache-Control: max-age=0, s-maxage=180
Content-Encoding: gzip

testSteps.description:
Then Check whether the following values are not null for "GET Request" using jsonpath
| banners |

children.description: Verifying whether the particular value from Json Response is not null : [{image={16x9=/media/images/a75072d4c959cfee31087af3dbb3ea25/test_pic1533821683200.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=Catch the latest dance track featuring Rajkumar & Shraddha., id=ec1c74d692c406ebf5643a4e7bad9ae5, title=Milegi Milegi | Stree, type=music}, {image={16x9=/media/images/5a62f99628f28fcad9fe4dbf83b2783d/test_pic1533820060220.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=The song and Chitrangadha, both seem ageless!, id=974599f2dc56b45213a9c05bf66c432c, title=Lag Ja Gale, type=music}, {image={16x9=/media/images/9fcfc318297ea774b87073981580b0bc/test_pic1533821424253.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=Old school romance with new age stars., id=25e2aae2d8eeda1ae308f8d4b08e2b6e, title=Main Badhiya Tu Bhi Badhiya | Sanju, type=music}, {image={16x9=/media/images/5e4900ca74062c99fee2ae1322efc316/test_pic1533821955300.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=Party Essential!, id=e42a035df48f1792123c86612f554f1c, title=Tareefan | Veere Di Wedding, type=music}, {image={16x9=/media/images/6fa9b9edbb3f3e6a317ac61762fdcd71/test_pic1533822131999.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=Desi Swag!, id=26454116ddd8581cc40a395319645335, title=High Rated Gabhru , type=music}, {image={16x9=/media/images/f041c949823fffedd689835878d2cb2b/test_pic1533822254231.jpg, 1x1=null, 2x3=null}, subTitle=Tollywood Top Song, id=62feb59ae37bb5ea939a81a9cd564f52, title=Reppalaninda | RX 100, type=music}]
